people.name: Plato
people.bio: A philosopher in Classical Greece and the founder of the Academy in Athens.

people.name: Aristotle
people.bio: An ancient Greek philosopher and scientist born in the city of Stagira.

people.name: William Shakespeare
people.bio: An English playwright, poet, and actor, widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language.

people.name: Jane Austen
people.bio: An English novelist known primarily for her six major novels.

packs.name: Scientists
packs.description: Journey through the lives of groundbreaking scientists.

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.bio: Theoretical physicist known for the theory of relativity and the equation E=mc^2.

people.name: Marie Curie
people.bio: Pioneer in the study of radioactivity and the first person to win Nobel Prizes in two different scientific fields.

people.name: Isaac Newton
people.bio: Influential mathematician and physicist, famous for his laws of motion and universal gravitation.

people.name: Nikola Tesla
people.bio: Inventor and electrical engineer known for his pioneering work on alternating current electrical systems.

people.name: Stephen Hawking
people.bio: Theoretical physicist and cosmologist known for his work on black holes and the nature of the universe.

people.name: Rosalind Franklin
people.bio: Chemist and X-ray crystallographer whose work was central to understanding the molecular structures of DNA.

packs.name: Artists
packs.description: Explore the creativity and vision of renowned artists.

packs.name: Musicians
packs.description: Discover the stories of influential musicians and composers.

packs.name: World Leaders
packs.description: Profiles of influential leaders throughout history and current times.

packs.name: Culinary Masters
packs.description: A journey through the lives and creations of renowned chefs and culinary experts.

packs.name: Cinema Legends
packs.description: Profiles of iconic film directors, actors, and movie industry pioneers.

packs.name: Sports Heroes
packs.description: Stories of legendary athletes and sports personalities.

packs.name: Adventure and Explorers
packs.description: Profiles of famous explorers and adventurers.
